attributes.action: Strengthen  punishments for those ignoring Court Orders
attributes.additional_details: We frequently hear of Courts making a judgement against a firm/individual only for that person(s) to totally ignore the judgement making a mockery of the law. I, like many other ordinary people, cannot believe that the Courts have so little teeth, and would suggest that this situation is reviewed with a view to imposing a prison sentence and/or confiscation order against such offenders. This would renew confidence in the legal system, and stop offenders laughting at the law.
